favourite.article: My David - my firstborn is serving Jesus Christ.
My name is David! I really like this song!

This was one of my favorite songs about nine years ago when I was in children's meeting. I'm so glad it's here!
We actually sang a different variation of the first verse: D-A-V-I-D was a skillful sheperd boy (just a boy) Watching tons of sheep out on the hill side (Baaa!) Singing songs to God who was at his side (LaLaLaLaLaLa!)
